thanks: 🌹 *Slurp*. Why thank you. You are my dearest friend…
🧜‍♂️ Thank you for rescuing me. Please accept from us the Essence of Water. We hope that it will aid you in restoring *mojick* to the world.
🦄 Thank you for this delightful throat drop. I was becoming hoarse.
🦌 I’m *free*. Thank you for making my nose glow again. I will once again take to the skies.
🐋 I can take a hint and *leave the bay* now. Maybe one day I will find my fountain of mojick and become the glorious *narwhal* once again.
Thank you. I feel much better now. Please accept this 🌡*thermometer*.
